item.title: 99 for skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @J3rk_Me_0ff3 J3rk Me 0ff3
item.description:
@J3rk_Me_0ff3 wrote:

Hey, can someone help we with this… I need to make it so u have to have 99 for a skillcape/hood… Here are the ones im having trouble with.

[code]
public int GetCLFiremaking(int ItemID) {
if (ItemID == 14131) {
return 99;
}
if (ItemID == 14132) {
return 99;
}
if (ItemID == 14130) {
return 99;
}
return 1;
}

public int GetCLConstruction(int ItemID) {
    if (ItemID == 14115) {
        return 99;
    }
    if (ItemID == 14116) {
        return 99;
    }
    if (ItemID == 14117) {
        return 99;
    }    
    return 1;
}

public int GetCLFarming(int ItemID) {

        return 99;
    }
    if (ItemID == 14137) {
        return 99;
    }
    if (ItemID == 14138) {
        return 99;
    }    
    return 1;
}

public int GetCLSmithing(int ItemID) {

        return 99;
    }
    if (ItemID == 14122) {
        return 99;
    }
    if (ItemID == 14123) {

    }    
    return 1;
}

public int GetCLMining(int ItemID) {

        return 99;
    }
    if (ItemID == 14119) {
        return 99;
    }

}

}

public int GetCLHerblore(int ItemID) {

        return 99;
    }
    if (ItemID == 14101) {
        return 99;
    }
